name: fetch-undici
description: Isomorphic exports of fetch from window and unduci
author: Bret Comnes <bcomnes@gmail.com> (https://bret.io)

scripts.test:esbuild: cd tests/esbuild && npm i && npm test
scripts.test:jest: cd tests/jest && npm i && npm test
scripts.test:rollup: cd tests/rollup && npm i && npm test
scripts.test:node: cd tests/node && npm i && npm test
scripts.version: auto-changelog -p --template keepachangelog auto-changelog --breaking-pattern 'BREAKING CHANGE:' && git add CHANGELOG.md
